g.text: Do Not Cite, Quote or Distribute
. These values span the full range reported by
The analysis uses a truck lifetime of 10 years and annual mileage of 140,000 km based on
. An effective payload of 17 tonnes (80% of maximum payload of 21 tonnes) is assumed based
on reported average effective payload submitted by Argonne Nationa
l Laboratory in response to the
IPCC LCA data collection call. A discount rate of 3% is used, based on
count rate from Chapter 3. Maintenance costs are assumed to be 0.15
USD/km for ICEV trucks and 0.09 USD/km for BEV and FCV trucks, as reported in
